html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Compute the product of a matrix with a vector in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
Relate matrix-vector equations to spans and linear combinations.

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 4 videos totaling 29 minutes, plus some questions.
